channel.title: theBalancedBriefNLbreakingNews
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLbreakingNews, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Former French president Nicolas Sarkozy greets supporters, hugs wife before heading to prison
Man gropes, attacks store's customers, then female shopper fatally shoots him, authorities say
5 simple fitness tests to know if you're considered healthy at 60
Concerned carmakers race to beat China's rare earths deadline
One of the world's rarest whales that makes the Atlantic its home grows in population
A man took videos as his home floated away with him inside in Alaska's storms
item.description: Typhoon Halong's remnants hit western Alaska with intense force and even pulled homes from their foundations

item.title: Ecuador says it has no evidence that survivor of a US strike in the Caribbean committed any crime

item.title: One of the world's rarest whales that makes the Atlantic its home grows in population
item.description: Scientists have reported an encouraging trend in the population growth of the North Atlantic right whale

item.title: US and Australia sign critical-minerals agreement as a way to counter China
item.description: President Donald Trump and Australian Prime Minister Anthony Albanese have signed a critical-minerals deal at the White House

item.title: World markets are mostly higher after Wall Street rally
